abstract: Utah Gov Gary Herbert signs law to allow firing squads for executions when lethal injection drugs are not available.
lead_paragraph: Utah on Monday became the only state to allow firing squads for executions when Gov. Gary Herbert signed a law approving the method when no drugs are available.

headline.main: Utah: Governor Signs Law Allowing Firing Squads
headline.print_headline: Utah: Governor Signs Law Allowing Firing Squads

snippet: Utah on Monday became the only state to allow firing squads for executions when Gov. Gary Herbert signed a law approving the method when no drugs are available.
